## Overview

[**UT SPARK** (Scalable and Adaptive Generalized Estimating Equations)](https://tech.utexas.edu/initiatives/artificial-intelligence/ut-spark/) is an innovative platform developed by the University of Texas at Austin where students, faculty, and staff can ignite curiosity, learning, and innovation to shape the future.

## Key Features

- **Scalability**: UT SPARK is designed to handle large datasets and complex computations, making it suitable for a wide range of research applications.
- **Adaptability**: The platform can be customized to meet the specific needs of different research projects, allowing users to tailor their computational environment.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: UT SPARK offers an intuitive interface that simplifies the process of setting up and managing computational tasks, making it accessible to users with varying levels of technical expertise.


## Getting Started

To get started with UT SPARK, visit the [official website](https://spark.utexas.edu/) for more information on how to access the platform. You can also explore available resources and tutorials to help you make the most of UT SPARK's capabilities.
